name: Rice Vinegar
benefits: Rice vinegar is a mild, slightly sweet vinegar made from fermented rice, commonly used in Asian cuisine. It has a gentler, less acidic taste compared to white or apple cider vinegar, making it ideal for delicate grain salads and Asian-inspired dressings. Like all vinegars, it provides metabolic benefits for weight loss when consumed with meals. Its subtle flavor pairs particularly well with quinoa, miso, and Asian vegetables.
amount: 2 tablespoons in dressings and grain salads
